overview.summary: Provide all parameters for a 4-layer anisotropic spherical volume conductor;

description.p: This module describes the geometry and the composition of a 4-layer anisotropic spherical volume conductor, resembling the human head. Its main purpose is to provide modules like 'DipoleInAnisoSpheres' or 'CreateDisAnisoSpheres' with all necessary information, to compute the potential distribution on the outer sphere of the volume conductor, due to a dipole in the innermost sphere.
The parameters which can be specified include:
radii for scalp, skull, cerebrospinal fluid and brain;
radial and tangential conductivities for scalp, skull, cerebrospinal fluid and brain;
elelctrode positions where the potential distribution should be computed (on the surface of the outermost sphere);
